drag(double, double) - Method in interface moulton.scalable.draggables.DraggableComponent
This method is called by the menu manager to signal that the mouse has moved x and y pixels since the component was clicked or last updated.

drag(double, double) - Method in class moulton.scalable.texts.TextBox
 
DraggableComponent - Interface in moulton.scalable.draggables
A type of MenuComponent that can be mouse dragged by the user and thus needs to be responsive in that regard through use of DraggableComponent.drag(double, double).
